text: @dx619hey Perfect Dark is set in the future, right? This mission is set in the 1920's in crime/mafia ridden Chicago, and is a unique story that homages/parodies things like The Godfather. I don't think it has anything to do with Perfect Dark.

text:
I made it through your entire list!
Best VGM 643 Margaret' philistine actually made me beat the game to listen it...

Just awesome list.

My requests are: Harvest Moon 64 Main Theme, more Twilight Princess (dunno why they hate it), Super Mario Kart - Mario Circuit, Fire Emblem - Black Knight Theme and Metroid Prime - Menu Select Theme.
author: Vinicius Trujillo

text: Hell yeah! I love the Timesplitters 2 soundtrack. This game and the music has so much nostalgia attached to it for me...my  friends and I spent so long on this game when it first came out trying to complete every challenge and unlock every character, and just playing arcade mode for hours on end. Man...I just got a real rush of memories as soon as that music started up....

text: Biggest surprise for me was definitely the announcement of Sly 4
author: 123INFLAMES666

text: And I can't say nothing about E3, which I'm finding mostly boring due to lack of big surprises. The Wii U is certainly interesting but I secretly knew about it for a while now. I'm definitely more hyped for Skywars Sword though, that game looks awesome (the music!). Far Cry 3 was a cool amnouncement as well, I liked the video they showed. Luigi's Mansion 2, cool as well.
author: SupraDarky

text: Now that Free Radical is Crytek UK, I wonder if we'll ever see a Timesplitters 4. Hopefully we do as it was a great, unique and humorous FPS series. Especially this game, it was my favorite one. Great music provided by Grant Norgate. For those who don't know, Free Radical consisted mostly of ex-Rare members who worked on games like Goldeneye and Perfect Dark.
author: SupraDarky
